documents.document: Wanted to give a huge thanks to Splott superstar @louclarkie for designing posters for meeting next week.
.@Plaid_Cymru any snappy lines for your candidates swearing from the gallery? Or the abuse I have had from twitter tolls for raising this?
Ever thought it should b easier to punish fly tippers. Welsh Government r consulting on doing this take part 9 Feb 7pm Moorland Com Centre
@louclarkie no that's great.
@louclarkie fancy helping with posters? Task is easy, make consultation look exciting.
@marcvjones @CardiffPlaid he is conducting what the kids are now calling #PostTruth politics or talking nonsense in old money
@marcvjones @CardiffPlaid it's an admittedly humorous diversion from me catching Neil out. https://t.co/6whmW0zCCS
Welsh Gov consulting on making it easier to prosecute fly tippers. Want to take part? Come along to Moorland Community Centre, 9th Feb, 7pm
I can cope personal stuff it just makes you look a bit daft. But you voted to remove green space protections. It sh… https://t.co/7zqk4juOsG
You are calling to remove protections. Putting power in the hands of developers. I presume me saying this is why th… https://t.co/UgXRNWWO1Z
Small thing but important, your motion removed all statutory protection for green space. Making it easier for devel… https://t.co/X8YeaJ50PY
Time to Talk day Thursday. So many of us have been affected by mental problems of our own or people we love, it is… https://t.co/TJW9BuqSBb

@girliegirlie17 @RevPhillipJ @neiljmcevoy it shouldn't be personal. Is saying the same thing in Splott and Fairwater to much to ask?
I have the hand movements but sadly musically I am hopeless https://t.co/Rkblw1uDjf
@girliegirlie17 @neiljmcevoy @RevPhillipJ is Phil Labour member?Is It not ok he holds his AM to account?
Yes. That's what's embarrassing. You have been caught. Stop digging and try being consistent https://t.co/nnpawn7hmF
Part of speech from full Council. Still can't inderatand why @neiljmcevoy denied ownership of own leaflet. Watch an… https://t.co/eHBtXBUayi

@neiljmcevoy @CardiffPlaid it's your leaflet Neil you just got found out. Further denials are embarrassing. Own your own campaign
@neiljmcevoy @CardiffPlaid it's got your number on it pal. You just got caught saying diff things in diff parts of Cardiff. #alternativefact
@CardiffPlaid @neiljmcevoy when Neil said that the leaflet about Plaid plans for 5000 homes wasn't his. That wasn't true was it? #typical
@neiljmcevoy @CardiffPlaid yes right Neil "it's not my leaflet Mcevoy" it was wasn't it? #alternativefacts
Very quiet since you said that leaflet calling for 6000 homes inSE Cardiff wasn't yours. Is that because I pointed… https://t.co/185NWXOpOz
@HBIndependents thanks
Rainy morning in Splott but great fun on our monthly litter pick #keepsplotttidy https://t.co/UeGIVfXSNt

Eastmoors youth cen is getting a refurb and the kids have been involved in designing it. Work to start on 6th of Feb. Can't wait to see it
.@JoGalazka you are the inspirer https://t.co/7W8mqYpGTE
Excellent. Time to show young carers we value them and give them this much needed support. https://t.co/KCzXv6n3TA
One last question about Splott Road resurfacing and I am now finally home from tonight's meeting @cardiffcouncil
Late night for me and @huwthomas_Wales at @cardiffcouncil but always a privilege to represent our area
@CardiffPlaid here is another leaflet same organisation. This one has a phone number. Guess who's?

Today is #YoungCarersAwarenessDay I am campaigning for @cardiffcouncil to introduce free bus travel for young carers @CarersTrust
@Atticus_75 @inksplott all buses will have access to the road.
Debate Cardiff council tonight. I will be opposing @CardiffPlaid plans to build 5000 homes in South East Cardiff in… https://t.co/0VhmDyEJmf
@sian_regan Moorland Community Centre?
Well done guys. With you in spirit if away for the weekend in person https://t.co/H7tdoNgWbZ
Sorry you had to be moved. Now time to stop it happening again. We need @swpcardiff help for that. I am on it. https://t.co/xWKrN80xGo
@inksplott @cardiffcouncil @Chrisnz125 more parking enforcement needed. I have seen a couple of locals who reg dbl park, very selfish act.
Welsh Tories label ALL public sector workers as middle class. In the latest bizarre tirade against workers rights
.@inksplott works on Splott Road will be carried out in a way that busses will have continued access.

#LALALAND was brilliant. Me and Berry even had a little dance on the way back to the car
It's Friday afternoon which means another house call to a resident. Important Cllrs are able to do this

@neiljmcevoy @JamieMatthews84 @Grettaelaine @LeanneWood @Plaid_Cymru when's her next Splott surgery? When was she last in Splott
Home after a good meeting with @thebunsrfc, they want to speak to @PEBradbury. Its dry January so a cup of tea is in order
@GoodwayCardiff no but it was a better perspective for the photo.
Outside the Moorland Community Centre ready for Labour Councillors surgery. Pop along if I can help with anything https://t.co/lSjqoPoUbZ

@gw7hoc @GHawke123 that's correct it will be near the Maltings. Lewis Road.

More good news 4 Splott, Tremorfa and Pengam Green. The planning application 4 the areas 1st new school in more than a generation submitted
Following significant lobbying by myself and @huwthomas_Wales we have a prov date for the resurfacing of Splott Rd, the 28th of Jan
@SDoughtyMP @jgfoxy @thebunsrfc @SplottBoy @swpcardiff @cardiffcouncil @huwthomas_Wales meeting with Club next week.
Lovely news that soft play started at the @oasiscardiff today. Pleased to have been able to help secure equipment #splott

.@cardiffcouncil issued 86 Fixed Penalty Notices between April and Nov in Splott ward for waste etc and launched 23 prosecutions.
